channel.title: [317] how to add correct stances for godswords? help. look
channel.description: ok well right now my godswords are welded over the shoulder with 1 hand, how do i make it held with 2 hands? the correct godsword stance.

item.title: [317] how to add correct stances for godswords? help. look
item.dc:creator: @regesterd regesterd
item.description:
@regesterd wrote:

owner of epic scape:

i have typed “godsword stance” in tutorial search, and “godsword” and nothing on how to add it, what am i looking for? i will find myself i just need to know what im looking for.

maybe your fucking brain cant operate at all.

Read full topic
